name: Jodrigo VS Covid-19
description:
This game was made for the JoJo-Jam! https://itch.io/jam/jojo-jam

Help Jodrigo Joestar destroy the dangerous covid-19 viruses!

Features DIY game engine, arts, music and sound FX!
All crafted with love by Roulyo.

How To Play:
- Move Jodrigo with WASD or ZQSD.
- Attack with left click. The attack will land where the cursor is relatively to Jodrigo.
- Stay alive and destroy as many Covid-19 viruses as you can to score points.

Known issues:
- Build is in debug.
- Assert() as Game-Over is now a feature.
- Do not get out of the camera or Jodrigo becomes uncontrollable.
- Sometimes sounds engine crashes and no more sounds are played.
